attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The room that we sit in at break and dinner has been locked because of damages that we did not do and we got the blame for it! So we want this room unlocked.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
